contest-event.event-date:
May 25, 1912 D Accrington Contest
Accrington Contest 0 Other
accrington-contest
None
Test Piece Contest
Maritana [unknown arranger]
Moorhead Park, Accrington 1st prize £10 and cup, 2nd prize £5, 3rd prize £3, 4th prize £2, 5th prize £1. Best trombone Nelson Old. Best soprano, cornet and euphonium Darwen Borough. Best baritone Barrow Shipyard. 5 bands competed.
May 7, 2012, 3:37 p.m. Sept. 27, 2018, 6:46 p.m.
1 Nelson Old William Halliwell
2 Darwen Borough Prize Band J. E. Fidler
3 Barrow Shipyard Band John Carter
4 Burnley Temperance Peter Fairhurst
5 Todmorden Old Band William Halliwell
Disqualified Batley Old Unknown
Withdrawn Sowerby Bridge Subscription Unknown
